name:
Dillon's Rolling Western™:
The Last Ranger
formal_name:
Dillon's Rolling Western™:
The Last Ranger
description:
Dillon, a rootin' tootin' cowboy
armadillo, battled the fearsome,
livestock-munching Grocks in his first
Nintendo 3DS game in 2012, but now
danger has returned to the plains!
Dillon's Rolling Western: The Last
Ranger, available from
Nintendo eShop on Nintendo 3DS,
brings back fast-paced tower defence
action in a Wild West-themed world.
Recruit new rangers, outlaws and
gunslingers to help Dillon on his quest
to defend villages from the new Grock
invasion!
